title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 45.7 - Nontaxable receipts from sales and services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 45.7 - Nontaxable receipts from sales and services

State Regulations

All receipts from sales or services are required to be
included in the return of gross income. Deductions may, however, be taken on
account of receipts which are not taxable, either for constitutional reasons or
statutory provisions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
45.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
